vision: Production-ready, enterprise-grade AI governance platform combining military-grade security, sub-millisecond performance, and ML-powered adaptive governance with perfect constitutional compliance

target_audience.primary: Enterprise DevOps/MLOps engineers deploying AI systems that require constitutional governance, compliance enforcement, and human-in-the-loop oversight
secondary: AI Safety Researchers studying constitutional AI governance patterns
Platform Architects designing multi-agent AI systems with policy enforcement
Compliance Officers ensuring AI systems meet regulatory requirements (SOC 2, ISO 27001, EU AI Act)
Security Engineers implementing zero-trust architectures for AI deployments

phases.name: Foundation - Production Hardening
phases.description: Complete MVP gaps, fix critical technical debt, achieve production-ready stability with 80%+ test coverage and resolved performance issues

milestones.title: Core ML Pipeline Optimization
milestones.description: ONNX GPU acceleration and optimized BERT inference working in production with sub-millisecond latency

milestones.title: API Production Readiness
milestones.description: All API placeholder implementations completed with proper message processing and configuration validation

milestones.title: Technical Debt Resolution
milestones.description: Deliberation layer optimized, test coverage at 80%+, all critical TODOs resolved

phases.name: Enhancement - Enterprise Differentiation
phases.description: Strengthen enterprise differentiators, implement comprehensive compliance packages, and build competitive advantages addressing key competitor pain points

milestones.title: HITL Deliberation v2 Complete
milestones.description: Production-ready event-driven vote collection with enhanced deliberation workflows and MACI role management

milestones.title: Compliance Certification Ready
milestones.description: Full documentation and audit trails for SOC 2, ISO 27001, and EU AI Act compliance with automated evidence collection

milestones.title: Developer Experience Excellence
milestones.description: Pre-built templates, interactive onboarding, IDE extensions, and comprehensive SDK packages

phases.name: Scale - Advanced Governance & Enterprise Features
phases.description: Implement advanced ML-powered governance features, multi-tenant enterprise capabilities, performance optimization for massive scale, and comprehensive analytics

milestones.title: Federated Learning Operational
milestones.description: Adaptive governance learns from cross-tenant feedback with privacy-preserving aggregation

milestones.title: Enterprise Multi-Tenancy & Scale
milestones.description: Full multi-tenant isolation with 10,000+ RPS performance and enterprise SSO integration

milestones.title: Advanced Analytics & Insights
milestones.description: Real-time governance analytics dashboard with predictive insights and executive reporting

phases.name: Vision - Future Innovation
phases.description: Research and development of next-generation governance capabilities including quantum-resistant security, global federation, and self-evolving governance systems

milestones.title: Quantum-Ready Security
milestones.description: Quantum-resistant cryptography integrated for future-proof security and immutable audit trails

milestones.title: Global Federation & Policy Marketplace
milestones.description: Cross-organization governance federation with community policy templates and marketplace

milestones.title: Self-Evolving Governance
milestones.description: Autonomous governance systems that adapt and improve based on emerging risks without human intervention

phases.name: Evolution - Next-Generation Governance
phases.description: Implement cutting-edge governance innovations including post-quantum cryptography, cross-organization federation, and self-evolving governance systems with comprehensive safety bounds

milestones.title: Post-Quantum Security
milestones.description: NIST-approved CRYSTALS-Kyber and CRYSTALS-Dilithium algorithms integrated for quantum-resistant constitutional hash validation

milestones.title: Federation Protocol
milestones.description: Cross-organization governance federation with trust establishment, policy synchronization, and distributed audit trails

milestones.title: Autonomous Governance
milestones.description: Self-evolving governance systems with safety guardrails, ethics evaluation, and human override capabilities

features.title: Enable ONNX GPU Acceleration
features.description: Debug and re-enable ONNX GPU acceleration for ML impact scoring. This involves resolving the issues documented at impact_scorer.py:323 to achieve hardware-accelerated inference for constitutional governance decisions.
features.rationale: Sub-millisecond P99 latency is a key differentiator against competitors like Guardrails AI and LangChain that have performance overhead concerns. GPU acceleration is critical for maintaining performance at enterprise scale while competitors struggle with latency.
acceptance_criteria: ONNX GPU acceleration enabled in production configuration
ML impact scoring P99 latency under 0.5ms with GPU acceleration
No regression in scoring accuracy compared to CPU inference
Automated tests validate GPU/CPU fallback behavior
Memory usage within Kubernetes pod limits
user_stories: As a DevOps engineer, I want governance decisions to complete in under 0.5ms so that AI pipelines maintain high throughput
As a Platform Architect, I want to leverage GPU resources so that impact scoring scales with system load

features.title: Fix Optimized BERT Inference
features.description: Debug and re-enable optimized BERT inference as documented at impact_scorer.py:67. Resolve performance issues preventing production use of the DistilBERT model for ML-based impact scoring.
features.rationale: ML-powered adaptive governance is identified as the #1 market gap across all 6 competitors who use only static rule-based approaches. Optimized inference is required to maintain latency targets while delivering AI-based governance.
acceptance_criteria: Optimized BERT inference enabled in production
Impact scoring accuracy matches or exceeds baseline metrics
Memory usage within acceptable limits for production pods
Integration tests validate ML pipeline end-to-end
Batch inference support for high-throughput scenarios
user_stories: As an AI Safety Researcher, I want accurate ML-based impact scoring so that high-risk decisions are correctly identified
As a DevOps engineer, I want efficient BERT inference so that ML operations don't become bottlenecks

features.title: Claude Flow Persistent Memory Implementation
features.description: Initialize and implement persistent memory in claude-flow service to maintain state across sessions and enable continuous learning patterns. Addresses the TODO for persistent memory initialization identified in project analysis.
features.rationale: Adaptive governance requires persistent state for learning from historical decisions. This enables the ML models to improve over time, a capability no competitor offers.
acceptance_criteria: Persistent memory storage implemented with Redis backend
State survives service restarts and pod rescheduling
Memory access patterns are performant (<10ms latency)
Memory cleanup and TTL policies implemented
Backup and restore procedures documented
user_stories: As an AI Safety Researcher, I want governance to learn from past decisions so that accuracy improves over time
As a DevOps engineer, I want persistent state so that service restarts don't lose governance context

features.title: Complete API Message Processing
features.description: Replace placeholder message processing logic in API endpoints (api.py:151) with production-ready implementation handling all message types, edge cases, and error conditions.
features.rationale: Core API functionality must be complete for production use. Incomplete message processing blocks real-world deployments and limits enterprise adoption. This is table stakes for enterprise readiness.
acceptance_criteria: All message types properly processed through API endpoints
Error handling covers all edge cases with appropriate status codes
API response times meet SLA targets (P99 < 100ms)
OpenAPI documentation updated with complete message specifications
Rate limiting and throttling implemented
user_stories: As a Platform Architect, I want reliable API endpoints so that multi-agent systems can integrate governance seamlessly
As a DevOps engineer, I want complete API functionality so that I can deploy without workarounds

features.title: Configuration Validation Improvements
features.description: Address TODO/FIXME patterns in configuration validation code to ensure robust configuration parsing, validation, and error reporting. Implement schema validation for all configuration files.
features.rationale: Configuration errors cause deployment failures and operational issues. Robust validation prevents misconfigurations that could impact governance decisions or create security vulnerabilities.
acceptance_criteria: All configuration parameters validated with meaningful error messages
Invalid configurations fail fast with clear remediation guidance
Zero TODO/FIXME markers remain in configuration validation code
Configuration validation tests achieve 95%+ coverage
JSON Schema validation for all config files
user_stories: As a DevOps engineer, I want clear configuration error messages so that I can quickly resolve deployment issues
As a Security Engineer, I want configuration validation so that insecure settings are rejected

features.title: Deliberation Layer Optimization
features.description: Complete optimization TODOs in deliberation layer code to ensure efficient handling of multi-stakeholder deliberation workflows at scale. Address all pending optimizations for HITL processing.
features.rationale: Human-in-the-loop deliberation is the #1 critical differentiator vs. all 6 competitors who lack HITL capabilities. Performance optimizations enable HITL at enterprise scale without blocking throughput.
acceptance_criteria: All TODO items in deliberation layer resolved
Deliberation workflow performance under load meets SLA
Concurrent deliberation sessions scale horizontally
No memory leaks in long-running deliberation processes
Load test validates 100+ concurrent deliberations
user_stories: As a Compliance Officer, I want efficient deliberation workflows so that high-impact decisions don't bottleneck operations
As a Platform Architect, I want scalable HITL so that governance works at enterprise transaction volumes

features.title: Increase Test Coverage to 80%
features.description: Improve system-wide test coverage from 65.65% to 80%+ with focus on critical governance paths, error handling, and integration scenarios. Resolve coverage discrepancy with enhanced components.
features.rationale: High test coverage (99.8% in enhanced components) is a production readiness differentiator. Consistent coverage across all components builds enterprise confidence and supports compliance requirements.
acceptance_criteria: System-wide test coverage reaches 80%+ as measured by pytest-cov
All critical governance decision paths have 90%+ coverage
Integration tests cover all service-to-service interactions
CI pipeline enforces minimum coverage thresholds
Coverage reports integrated into CI/CD with trend tracking
user_stories: As a Compliance Officer, I want comprehensive test coverage so that governance reliability is validated
As a DevOps engineer, I want high test coverage so that I can deploy with confidence

features.title: Structured Logging Standardization
features.description: Complete the conversion of remaining print statements (498 identified) to structured logging across the codebase. Implement consistent log levels, correlation IDs, and JSON formatting for enterprise log aggregation.
features.rationale: Enterprise customers require structured logging for integration with their observability stacks (Splunk, ELK, Datadog). Inconsistent logging creates operational overhead and compliance gaps.
acceptance_criteria: Zero print statements in production code paths
All logs use structured JSON format
Correlation IDs propagated across service boundaries
Log levels follow RFC 5424 severity guidelines
Integration guide for Splunk, ELK, Datadog documented
user_stories: As a DevOps Engineer, I want structured logs so that I can integrate with my organization's log aggregation platform
As an SRE, I want correlation IDs so that I can trace requests across all three services

features.title: LLM-Based Intent Classification Enhancement
features.description: Complete the LLM-powered classification in intent_classifier.py to handle edge cases and ambiguous governance decisions that rule-based systems cannot resolve. Addresses TODO at intent_classifier.py:71.
features.rationale: Addresses known gap in the system. Enterprise customers need high accuracy on ambiguous cases where static rules fail. Competitors like OPA provide no AI-based classification, creating a key differentiation.
acceptance_criteria: LLM integration operational for ambiguous case detection
Fallback to rule-based classification when confidence is high
Accuracy improvement of 15%+ on ambiguous test cases
Response latency stays within P99 < 50ms for LLM calls with caching
Model versioning and A/B testing capability implemented
user_stories: As an AI Platform Engineer, I want the system to intelligently classify ambiguous governance cases so that edge cases don't require manual intervention
As a Compliance Officer, I want confident decisions even on unclear inputs so that I can trust the governance outcomes

features.title: Multi-Turn PACAR Verifier Support
features.description: Extend the PACAR (Policy-Aligned Constitutional AI Reasoning) verifier to support multi-turn conversations and context tracking for complex, multi-step governance workflows.
features.rationale: Modern AI systems involve multi-turn interactions. Without this, the governance system cannot properly evaluate policies across conversation context, limiting enterprise use cases. No competitor offers this capability.
acceptance_criteria: PACAR verifier tracks context across multiple API calls
Conversation state persisted in Redis with configurable TTL
Context window management for long conversations
API endpoints support session_id parameter for context linking
Performance maintains P99 < 1ms for context lookups
user_stories: As an AI Platform Engineer, I want to evaluate governance policies across entire conversations so that I can enforce constitutional compliance on complex workflows
As a Security Engineer, I want conversation context tracked for governance so that multi-step attacks or policy circumvention are detected

features.title: Event-Driven Vote Collection
features.description: Implement production-ready event-driven vote collection for deliberation workflows as documented in deliberation_workflow.py:336. Enable real-time vote aggregation via Kafka events with guaranteed delivery.
features.rationale: HITL with multi-stakeholder voting is the major differentiator addressing gaps in all 6 competitors (Guardrails AI, NeMo, AWS Bedrock, Azure, OPA, LangChain). This completes the core deliberation system.
acceptance_criteria: Votes collected via Kafka events in real-time with guaranteed delivery
Vote aggregation supports configurable quorum rules
Timeout handling with automatic escalation paths
Audit trail captures all voting events with timestamps and signatures
Support for weighted voting based on role/expertise
user_stories: As a Compliance Officer, I want real-time voting so that high-impact decisions get timely human oversight
As a Security Engineer, I want immutable vote records so that governance decisions are auditable

features.title: Enhanced MACI Role Management
features.description: Extend MACI (Monitor, Auditor, Controller, Implementer) role separation with dynamic role assignment, role hierarchies, delegation capabilities, and role-based escalation paths.
features.rationale: Advanced role separation addresses enterprise governance requirements not met by any competitor. Enables complex organizational structures for AI oversight with proper separation of duties.
acceptance_criteria: Dynamic role assignment based on context, availability, and expertise
Role hierarchies enable multi-level escalation chains
Role delegation with time-bound temporary assignments
Role-based access control enforced at API layer
Role audit logging captures all assignments and changes
user_stories: As a Platform Architect, I want flexible role management so that governance fits organizational structures
As a Compliance Officer, I want role audit trails so that responsibility is clearly documented

features.title: HITL Workflow Automation and Approval Chains
features.description: Enhance Human-in-the-Loop deliberation with configurable approval chains, time-based auto-escalation, and integration with enterprise communication tools (Slack, Teams, PagerDuty).
features.rationale: Market gap analysis shows HITL deliberation is missing from all competitors. This is the key differentiator. Enterprise customers need structured approval workflows for high-impact governance decisions.
acceptance_criteria: Configurable approval chains with role-based routing
Time-based escalation when approvals are delayed
Slack/Teams integration for approval notifications
PagerDuty integration for critical escalations
Mobile-friendly approval interface
Audit trail for all approval decisions
user_stories: As a Compliance Officer, I want approval workflows so that high-impact AI decisions require appropriate oversight
As an AI Safety Researcher, I want escalation policies so that critical decisions never get stuck
As a Platform Engineer, I want notifications in Slack so that I can respond to approvals quickly

features.title: EU AI Act Compliance Documentation
features.description: Create comprehensive documentation and automated compliance checks for EU AI Act requirements for high-risk AI systems, including risk assessment templates, conformity checklists, and regulatory reporting.
features.rationale: EU AI Act compliance is the fastest-growing enterprise requirement. No competitor offers built-in EU AI Act support - this addresses major pain points in Guardrails AI, NeMo, AWS Bedrock, and Azure Content Safety.
acceptance_criteria: Complete EU AI Act compliance checklist for high-risk AI systems
Automated compliance validation APIs with detailed findings
Risk assessment documentation templates (Article 9)
Human oversight documentation templates (Article 14)
Audit export format compatible with regulatory requirements
Quarterly compliance report generation
user_stories: As a Compliance Officer, I want EU AI Act templates so that I can demonstrate regulatory compliance
As a DevOps engineer, I want automated compliance checks so that deployments meet regulatory requirements
As a Legal Advisor, I want risk assessment documentation so that liability is properly documented

features.title: SOC 2 and ISO 27001 Compliance Package
features.description: Develop compliance artifacts, control mappings, and automated evidence collection for SOC 2 Type II and ISO 27001 certification preparation with continuous compliance monitoring.
features.rationale: Enterprise customers require security certifications for vendor approval. Pre-built compliance package reduces time-to-certification and differentiates from competitors lacking compliance support.
acceptance_criteria: SOC 2 control mapping documentation complete (all Trust Services Criteria)
ISO 27001 Annex A control mapping documentation complete
Automated evidence collection for continuous compliance
Auditor-friendly export formats for certification audits
Control effectiveness monitoring dashboard
Gap analysis reporting for certification readiness
user_stories: As a Security Engineer, I want SOC 2 control mappings so that I can prepare for certification audits
As a Compliance Officer, I want automated evidence collection so that compliance is continuous
As an Internal Auditor, I want control effectiveness monitoring so that I can identify gaps

features.title: Pre-Built Constitutional Templates Library
features.description: Create a library of pre-built constitutional governance templates for common use cases (financial AI, healthcare AI, content moderation, autonomous systems, customer service AI) with customization guides.
features.rationale: Addresses OPA pain point of requiring significant custom development. Templates reduce time-to-value from weeks to hours and lower adoption barrier vs. building governance from scratch.
acceptance_criteria: At least 8 industry-specific constitutional templates
Templates validated with domain experts and compliance reviewers
Customization documentation for each template
Templates deployable via Helm chart configuration
Template selection wizard in documentation
Version control for template updates
user_stories: As a DevOps engineer, I want pre-built templates so that I can deploy governance in hours not weeks
As a Platform Architect, I want industry-specific policies so that governance fits our regulatory domain

features.title: Interactive Developer Onboarding Experience
features.description: Build an interactive onboarding experience with guided tutorials, sample deployments, Jupyter notebooks, and a playground environment for developers to learn ACGS-2 governance concepts.
features.rationale: Addresses NeMo Guardrails' steep Colang DSL learning curve and OPA's Rego complexity by providing approachable onboarding. Reduces time to first successful governance deployment to under 30 minutes.
acceptance_criteria: Interactive tutorial covering core governance concepts
Sample deployment working in under 30 minutes (quickstart)
Playground environment with pre-configured scenarios
Video tutorials for key workflows
Developer satisfaction score 4+ out of 5 in surveys
Onboarding analytics to track drop-off points
user_stories: As a new DevOps engineer, I want guided tutorials so that I can learn governance concepts quickly
As a Platform Architect, I want sample deployments so that I can evaluate ACGS-2 easily
As a Developer Advocate, I want onboarding analytics so that I can improve the experience

features.title: Official SDK Packages (Python, TypeScript, Go)
features.description: Create and publish official SDK packages for Python, TypeScript, and Go with type-safe interfaces, automatic retry logic, connection pooling, and comprehensive examples.
features.rationale: Enterprise developers expect polished SDKs. Current API requires manual HTTP calls. SDKs reduce integration time and errors, accelerating adoption. Addresses complexity pain points from competitors.
acceptance_criteria: Python SDK published to PyPI with 100% API coverage
TypeScript SDK published to npm with full TypeScript types
Go SDK published to Go modules registry
All SDKs include automatic retry with exponential backoff
Connection pooling and keep-alive implemented
SDK documentation with examples for each endpoint
user_stories: As a Python Developer, I want an official SDK so that I can integrate governance with minimal boilerplate
As a TypeScript Developer, I want type-safe interfaces so that I get IDE autocompletion and error checking
As a Go Developer, I want idiomatic Go SDK so that integration feels native

features.title: VS Code Extension and CLI Enhancement
features.description: Develop VS Code extension for OPA Rego policy authoring with syntax highlighting, validation, testing, and governance simulation. Enhance CLI with interactive policy testing and deployment helpers.
features.rationale: Improves developer experience for policy authoring. Reduces friction in adopting OPA-based governance by bringing tooling into familiar development environments. Addresses Rego learning curve.
acceptance_criteria: VS Code extension published to marketplace
Syntax highlighting for Rego and constitutional configs
Policy validation with inline error reporting
Local policy testing and simulation
CLI supports policy validation and dry-run deployment
Web-based policy playground accessible without authentication
user_stories: As a DevOps engineer, I want IDE integration so that I can author policies efficiently
As a Security Engineer, I want policy validation so that I catch errors before deployment
As a new user, I want a playground so that I can experiment without setup

features.title: Federated Learning for Adaptive Governance
features.description: Implement federated learning capabilities that enable the adaptive governance system to learn from cross-tenant feedback without compromising data privacy or tenant isolation.
features.rationale: ML-based adaptive governance is identified as the key gap across all competitors. Federated learning enables improvement at ecosystem scale while maintaining enterprise privacy requirements. No competitor offers this.
acceptance_criteria: Federated learning model updates without sharing raw data
Privacy-preserving aggregation of governance feedback
Tenant data isolation maintained during learning
Model performance improves with more tenants (network effect)
Opt-in/opt-out for federated learning participation
user_stories: As an AI Safety Researcher, I want federated learning so that governance improves across the ecosystem
As a Security Engineer, I want privacy-preserving learning so that tenant data remains isolated
As a Compliance Officer, I want opt-out capability so that I control data sharing

features.title: Advanced Impact Scoring with Explainability
features.description: Enhance ML impact scoring with explainability features that provide clear reasoning for score calculations, enabling governance transparency and auditability required by EU AI Act.
features.rationale: Addresses Azure AI Content Safety's black box criticism and EU AI Act explainability requirements. Explainable AI is becoming regulatory requirement. Transparency builds enterprise trust.
acceptance_criteria: Impact scores include human-readable explanations
Key contributing factors identified for each score
Explanations exportable for compliance documentation (EU AI Act Article 13)
UI displays explainability information clearly
SHAP or LIME integration for model interpretability
user_stories: As a Compliance Officer, I want explainable scores so that I can justify governance decisions to regulators
As an AI Safety Researcher, I want transparency so that I can validate scoring accuracy
As a Legal Advisor, I want documentation so that liability is properly attributed

features.title: Multi-Tenant Enterprise Architecture
features.description: Implement full multi-tenant architecture with isolated governance policies, dedicated resources, per-tenant encryption, tenant-specific SLA configurations, and resource quotas.
features.rationale: Enterprise deployments require strong tenant isolation for security and compliance. Multi-tenancy enables SaaS deployment model and reduces operational overhead for governance service providers.
acceptance_criteria: Complete tenant isolation at data and policy levels
Per-tenant resource quotas and rate limiting
Tenant-specific encryption keys via KMS integration
Tenant administration portal for self-service
Tenant-scoped audit logs with access controls
Security audit confirms isolation effectiveness
user_stories: As a Platform Architect, I want multi-tenancy so that I can offer governance as a service
As a Security Engineer, I want tenant isolation so that data breaches are contained
As a Tenant Admin, I want self-service so that I can manage my organization independently

features.title: Performance Optimization for 10,000+ RPS
features.description: Optimize the system architecture to handle 10,000+ requests per second while maintaining P99 latency below 1ms. Implement advanced caching strategies, connection pooling optimization, and Rust extensions for hot paths.
features.rationale: Performance is a key differentiator vs competitors with latency overhead. Current 2,500+ RPS is good but enterprise scale may require more. Proactive optimization prevents governance becoming a bottleneck.
acceptance_criteria: System sustains 10,000 RPS in load testing
P99 latency remains below 1ms at 10K RPS
Cache hit rate exceeds 98%
Hot path Rust extensions deployed and validated
Horizontal scaling demonstrated to 20K RPS
Performance regression tests in CI/CD
user_stories: As a Platform Engineer, I want the system to scale to massive traffic so that governance never becomes a bottleneck
As an SRE, I want performance guarantees so that SLOs are maintained under peak load

features.title: Enterprise SSO Integration (SAML, OIDC)
features.description: Implement enterprise Single Sign-On support with SAML 2.0 and OpenID Connect. Support integration with Okta, Azure AD, Google Workspace, and custom IdPs with JIT provisioning.
features.rationale: Enterprise deployment requirement - organizations mandate SSO for all production systems. Without SSO, ACGS-2 cannot be deployed in many enterprise environments due to security policies.
acceptance_criteria: SAML 2.0 SP implementation complete
OIDC RP implementation complete
Tested integrations with Okta, Azure AD, Google Workspace
JIT (Just-In-Time) provisioning supported
Role mapping from IdP groups to MACI roles
SSO session management with proper logout
user_stories: As a Security Engineer, I want SSO so that ACGS-2 integrates with our identity provider
As an Administrator, I want automatic user provisioning so that I don't manage users manually

features.title: Real-Time Governance Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Build comprehensive real-time analytics dashboard with governance metrics, trend analysis, anomaly detection, and customizable visualization widgets for operations teams.
features.rationale: Observability and visibility are enterprise requirements. Dashboard provides operational insights beyond basic metrics, enabling proactive governance management and executive reporting.
acceptance_criteria: Real-time governance decision metrics and KPIs
Historical trend analysis with customizable timeframes
Anomaly detection for unusual governance patterns
Customizable dashboard widgets
Export capabilities for executive reporting (PDF, CSV)
Integration with existing Grafana stack
user_stories: As a Compliance Officer, I want governance analytics so that I can report on AI governance effectiveness
As a DevOps engineer, I want real-time metrics so that I can identify governance issues quickly
As an Executive, I want dashboards so that I can understand governance health at a glance

features.title: Usage-Based Billing Integration
features.description: Implement governance decision metering and billing integration for enterprise and SaaS deployments with detailed usage analytics, cost allocation, and budget alerting.
features.rationale: Addresses AWS Bedrock's cost unpredictability by enabling transparent, predictable billing. Required for SaaS business model and enterprise chargeback scenarios.
acceptance_criteria: Accurate metering of governance decisions by type
Integration with Stripe and other billing providers
Usage dashboards for cost visibility per tenant
Alerting for budget thresholds
Cost allocation by team/department for enterprise
user_stories: As a Platform Architect, I want usage metering so that I can monetize governance services
As a DevOps engineer, I want cost visibility so that I can manage governance expenses
As a Finance Team member, I want cost allocation so that I can chargeback to departments

features.title: Third-Party Integration Ecosystem
features.description: Build integrations with popular enterprise tools: SIEM systems (Splunk, Sentinel), ticketing (Jira, ServiceNow), CI/CD (GitHub Actions, GitLab CI), and data platforms (Snowflake, Databricks).
features.rationale: Enterprise customers have established tool ecosystems. Integrations reduce friction, increase stickiness, and enable governance in existing workflows. Competitors often lack enterprise integrations.
acceptance_criteria: Splunk and Microsoft Sentinel SIEM integrations
Jira and ServiceNow ticketing integrations
GitHub Actions and GitLab CI integration actions
Webhook framework for custom integrations
Integration marketplace/catalog page
Each integration documented with setup guides
user_stories: As a Security Engineer, I want SIEM integration so that governance events appear in our security dashboard
As a DevOps Engineer, I want CI/CD integration so that policy checks happen in pull requests

features.title: Quantum-Resistant Cryptography Integration
features.description: Integrate quantum-resistant cryptographic algorithms for constitutional hash validation and audit trail integrity, preparing for post-quantum security threats with NIST-approved algorithms.
features.rationale: Long-term security investment addressing future quantum computing threats. Differentiates ACGS-2 as forward-thinking security leader in AI governance space.
acceptance_criteria: NIST-approved post-quantum algorithms integrated (CRYSTALS-Kyber, CRYSTALS-Dilithium)
Hybrid classical/quantum-resistant mode for transition period
Constitutional hash validation updated for quantum resistance
Performance impact under 10% for cryptographic operations
Migration path documented for existing deployments
user_stories: As a Security Engineer, I want quantum-resistant cryptography so that governance remains secure long-term
As a Compliance Officer, I want future-proof security so that audit trails remain tamper-proof for decades

features.title: Policy Marketplace and Community Templates
features.description: Create a marketplace for sharing and discovering governance policy templates. Include verified templates for common use cases, community contributions, ratings, and organization-specific template libraries.
features.rationale: Reduces time-to-value for new users. Community templates create network effects. Addresses the learning curve by providing starting points. Builds ecosystem around ACGS-2 governance.
acceptance_criteria: Marketplace web interface operational
15+ verified starter templates available at launch
Community contribution and review workflow
Template versioning and update notifications
Organization-private template libraries
Template analytics (downloads, ratings, usage)
user_stories: As a new user, I want policy templates so that I don't start from scratch
As an experienced user, I want to share policies so that the community benefits from my work
As a security auditor, I want verified templates so that I can trust community contributions

features.title: Cross-Organization Governance Federation
features.description: Implement federated governance across organizational boundaries, enabling shared governance policies and mutual recognition of constitutional compliance between partner entities.
features.rationale: Addresses complex enterprise scenarios with partners, subsidiaries, and supply chains. Enables governance at industry and ecosystem levels for regulatory coordination.
acceptance_criteria: Federation protocol for cross-organization governance
Mutual recognition of constitutional compliance
Policy inheritance and override mechanisms
Federation audit trails span organizations
Trust establishment and verification workflows
user_stories: As a Platform Architect, I want federation so that governance works across organizational boundaries
As a Compliance Officer, I want mutual recognition so that partner compliance is verified
As a Supply Chain Manager, I want federated governance so that AI risks are managed across vendors

features.title: Multi-Region Global Deployment
features.description: Enable multi-region deployment with data residency controls, regional failover, cross-region replication, and compliance with local data sovereignty requirements (GDPR, China PIPL, etc.).
features.rationale: Global enterprises require regional deployments for data sovereignty. EU AI Act and GDPR mandate data residency. Multi-region also improves reliability and latency for global users.
acceptance_criteria: Multi-region Kubernetes deployment templates
Data residency controls per tenant with geofencing
Cross-region replication with configurable lag
Regional failover with <30 second RTO
GDPR and PIPL compliance verified for regional data
Latency-based routing to nearest region
user_stories: As a Global Platform Engineer, I want multi-region deployment so that governance is fast for all users
As a Compliance Officer, I want data residency controls so that EU data stays in EU
As an SRE, I want regional failover so that outages are contained

features.title: Self-Evolving Governance Systems
features.description: Research and prototype autonomous governance systems that can adapt policies based on emerging risks, regulatory changes, and operational feedback without human intervention, with appropriate safety bounds.
features.rationale: Cutting-edge research direction for autonomous AI governance. Long-term vision for reducing human governance burden while maintaining compliance. Represents the future of adaptive AI governance.
acceptance_criteria: Prototype autonomous policy adaptation mechanism
Safety bounds preventing unsafe policy evolution
Human override capabilities for all autonomous changes
Explainability for all policy adaptations
Research publication documenting approach and findings
Ethics review and approval for autonomous governance
user_stories: As an AI Safety Researcher, I want self-evolving governance so that systems adapt to new threats automatically
As a Platform Architect, I want autonomous governance so that operational burden decreases over time
As a Compliance Officer, I want safety bounds so that autonomous changes can't violate regulations

features.title: NIST Post-Quantum Cryptography Integration
features.description: Implement CRYSTALS-Kyber (ML-KEM) for key encapsulation and CRYSTALS-Dilithium (ML-DSA) for digital signatures per NIST FIPS 203/204. Provides quantum-resistant constitutional hash validation and audit trail integrity.
features.rationale: Long-term security investment addressing future quantum computing threats. Positions ACGS-2 as forward-thinking security leader with NIST-standardized post-quantum algorithms.
acceptance_criteria: CRYSTALS-Kyber-768 KEM implemented for key exchange
CRYSTALS-Dilithium-3 DSA implemented for hash signing
Constitutional hash validation uses quantum-resistant signatures
Performance impact under 10% for cryptographic operations
Hybrid classical/PQC mode available for transition period
user_stories: As a Security Engineer, I want quantum-resistant cryptography so that governance remains secure against future quantum attacks
As a Compliance Officer, I want NIST-approved algorithms so that audit trails remain tamper-proof for decades

features.title: Cross-Organization Governance Federation
features.description: Implement federated governance across organizational boundaries with trust establishment protocols, policy inheritance/override, cross-org audit trails, and mutual compliance recognition.
features.rationale: Addresses complex enterprise scenarios with partners, subsidiaries, and supply chains. Enables governance at industry and ecosystem levels for regulatory coordination.
acceptance_criteria: Trust establishment protocol with challenge-response verification
Policy synchronization with push/pull mechanisms
Cross-organization Merkle-tree audit trails
Mutual compliance attestation framework
Federation agreement signing and management
user_stories: As a Platform Architect, I want federation so that governance works across organizational boundaries
As a Compliance Officer, I want mutual recognition so that partner compliance is verified
As a Supply Chain Manager, I want federated governance so that AI risks are managed across vendors

features.title: Self-Evolving Governance with Safety Bounds
features.description: Research prototype for autonomous governance systems that adapt policies based on emerging risks, regulatory changes, and operational feedback with comprehensive safety guardrails and human override capabilities.
features.rationale: Cutting-edge research for autonomous AI governance. Long-term vision for reducing human governance burden while maintaining compliance with ethics review integration.
acceptance_criteria: Risk detection with statistical analysis and anomaly detection
Evolution proposal generation with confidence scoring
Safety guardrails for bias, harm prevention, transparency, human agency
Ethics evaluation across six categories
Human approval workflow for high-risk evolutions
Emergency halt capability
user_stories: As an AI Safety Researcher, I want self-evolving governance so that systems adapt to new threats automatically
As a Platform Architect, I want autonomous governance so that operational burden decreases over time
As a Compliance Officer, I want safety bounds so that autonomous changes can't violate regulations

features.title: Ethics-Aware Evolution Engine
features.description: Comprehensive ethics evaluation framework for autonomous policy evolution with multi-dimensional scoring across fairness, transparency, privacy, autonomy, safety, and accountability categories.
features.rationale: Required for responsible deployment of autonomous governance. Ensures all policy evolutions are evaluated against ethical principles before application.
acceptance_criteria: Six-category ethics scoring (fairness, transparency, privacy, autonomy, safety, accountability)
Configurable ethics thresholds
Ethics violation blocking for autonomous evolutions
Ethics audit trail for all proposals
Integration with human review workflow
user_stories: As an Ethics Board member, I want comprehensive ethics evaluation so that autonomous governance aligns with our values
As a Legal Advisor, I want ethics documentation so that liability is properly attributed
